item.title: Create a video with static background image and audio
item.description: Sometimes, I like to share music to my Discord friends. Unfortunately, Discord doesn’t yet have native audio player in mobile apps.

item.title: FFMPEG Installation
item.description: What’s FFMPEG? Install FFMPEG on Windows Pre-compiled binaries Recommend getting Windows Terminal! Go to gyan.dev/ffmpeg/builds and pick either Git/Stable and Full/Essential (Recommend getting Stable-Full, I mainly use git for encoding with latest versions of AV1 encoders ) Extract the contents of .

item.title: Video with different video codes for testing browser support
item.description: All of these videos are encoded with target bitrate of 4M, individual video weighing at around 9 MB. AVC/H.264 Huh var video = document.
